card.name: Bart
card.text: Bart doesn't count as 1 of your 2 Characters for this turn.

prop.type: Character - Star - Tough - Rascal - Family - Kid

card.name: Homer
card.text: Homer doesn't count as 1 of your 2 Characters for this turn.

prop.type: Character - Star - Fat - Lazy - Family - Idiot

card.name: Krusty
card.text: Krusty doesn't count as 1 of your 2 Characters for this turn.

prop.type: Character - Star - Fat - Oddball - Lazy - Celebrity

card.name: Lisa
card.text: Lisa doesn't count as 1 of your 2 Characters for this turn.

prop.type: Character - Star - Brainy - Family - Upstanding - Kid

card.name: Mr. Burns
card.text: Mr. Burns doesn't count as 1 of your 2 Characters for this turn.

prop.type: Character - Star - Tough - Old - Uptight - Rascal

card.name: The Android's Dungeon
card.text: If this Scene is completed, only the player with the most Characters on it gets points. If there's a tie, no one gets any points.

card.name: Take a Peek
card.text: Use at the start of another player's turn. Look at that player's hand and play any Characters in it on any Scenes you choose. (They don't count against the 2 Character per turn limit.)

card.name: Search and Destroy
card.text: Use when an Uptight Character is played. All Uptight Characters are discarded from play.

card.name: The Itchy & Scratchy Store
card.text: If this Scene is completed, all Uptight Characters on other Scenes are discarded from play.

card.name: Bait and Switch
card.text: Use when a Character is played. Choose a Scene. Move that Character to that Scene.

card.name: Come from Behind
card.text: Use during your turn if you have fewer points than each other player. Take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Save the Animals
card.text: Use during your turn Play all Animal Characters in your discard pile on any Scenes. (They don't count against the 2 Character per turn limit.)

card.name: Guilt By Association
card.text: Use when a Character is played. That Character and all Characters with any of its traits are discarded from play.

card.name: Bonus Play
card.text: Use any time. You draw 3 cards.

card.name: Taste of Victory
card.text: Use during your turn. Move all Characters that match your Scene to it.

card.name: The Couch
card.text: Family Characters can't be played to any other Scene.

card.name: The Playground
card.text: When this Scene is played, move all Kid Characters from other Scenes to this one.

card.name: Springfield Town Hall
card.text: While this Scene is in play, each other Scene needs 1 more Character to complete it.

card.name: Know-It-All
card.text: Use when another player tries to play an Action. That Action does nothing and is discarded.

card.name: Executive Privilege
card.text: Use when another player completes a Scene that has a Rascal Character on it. You get 1 point.

card.name: Dumb Luck
card.text: Use when another player completes a Scene that has an Idiot Character on it. If that player would get points from that scene, you get those points instead.

card.name: Noise Land Video Arcade
card.text: If this Scene is completed, all Characters on other Scenes that match the Scenes they're on are discarded from play.

card.name: Whacking Day
card.text: If this Scene is trashed, each player with Animal Characters on it may move them to other Scenes.

card.name: Misalignment
card.text: Use during your turn. All characters move 1 Scene to the left.

card.name: Game Over
card.text: Use if you have 6 points. You win the game.

card.name: Springfield Nuclear Plant
card.text: The player who completes this Scene may choose another Scene in play. That Scene and all Characters on it are discarded from play.

card.name: Stand and Deliver
card.text: Use during your turn. Play all Rascal Characters in your discard pile on your scene. (They don't count against the 2 Character per turn limit.)

card.name: Bart's Treehouse
card.text: If this Scene is completed using Bart, the player who played this Scene gets 1 extra point.

card.name: Who Shot Mr. Burns
card.text: No Characters match this Scene. The player who trashes this Scene gets 1 extra point and takes an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Springfield Mall
card.text: The player who trashes this Scene may return up to 2 cards in his or her discard pile to his or her hand.

card.name: 742 Evergreen Terrace
card.text: The player who completes this Scene gets 1 extra point.

card.name: Barney's Bowl-A-Rama
card.text: The player who completes this Scene may choose 1 character in his or her discard pile and either return it to his or her hand or play it on another scene. (It doesn't count against the 2 Character per turn limit.)

card.name: Healthy Choice
card.text: Use when a Fat Character is played. All Fat Characters are discarded from play.

card.name: Butting In
card.text: Use when another player tries to complete or trash a scene. You choose which Characters are used to complete or trash it.

card.name: Parental Control
card.text: Use when a Kid Character is played. All Kid Characters are discarded from play.

card.name: Springfield Isotopes Game
card.text: If this Scene is trashed, no one gets any points.

card.name: Back to Square One
card.text: Use when a Character is played to a scene it matches. All Characters that match the Scenes they're on are discarded from play.

card.name: Staff Review
card.text: Use during your turn. Move all Characters on your Scene to any Scenes you choose.

card.name: Kwik-E-Mart
card.text: While Apu Nahasapeemapetilon is on this Scene, this Scene needs 1 less Character to complete it, and 1 more to trash it.

card.name: Fine Print
card.text: Use at the start of any player's turn. Choose a player. That player can't get points this turn.

card.name: Share the Wealth
card.text: Use when another player completes a Scene and you don't get any points. You get 1 point.

card.name: No Eggheads
card.text: Use when an Oddball or Brainy Character is played. All Oddball Characters and Brainy Characters are discarded from play.

card.name: Trapped Like a Rat
card.text: Use when another player tries to play a Scene. That Scene is discarded.

card.name: Everyone's a Winner
card.text: Use during your turn. Take an extra turn after this one. Each player with fewer points than you gets one point.

card.name: Science Fair
card.text: You may play this Scene even if you have a Scene in play. Discard your old scene, but move all Characters on it to this one.

card.name: The Leftorium
card.text: If this Scene is completed or trashed, reverse the direction of play.

card.name: Moe's Tavern
card.text: If this Scene is completed using Homer, the player who played this Scene gets 1 extra point.

card.name: Check the Rules
card.text: Use at any time. Flip over the top 3 cards of your deck. Play any Characters flipped over on a single Scene and discard the rest. (They don't count against the 2 Character per turn limit.)

card.name: Star Power
card.text: Use any time. Flip over the top 3 cards of your deck. Play any Celebrity Characters flipped over on any Scenes you choose and discard the rest. (They don't count against the 2 Character per turn limit.)

card.name: All Creatures Great and Cheap
card.text: This scene needs 1 less Character to complete it for each Animal Character on it.

card.name: Smoke 'Em If You Got 'Em
card.text: Use during your turn. For each scene in play, if you have a Character in your hand that matches the Scene, you may play that Character on it. (It doesn't count against the 2 Character per turn limit.)

card.name: Parade of Idiots
card.text: Use when an Idiot Character is played. Choose a Scene. Move all Idiot Characters to that Scene.

card.name: All Mine
card.text: Use when another player trashes a scene. Only you can get points from that Scene.

card.name: Kid Stuff
card.text: Use during your turn. Except for Kid Characters, all Characters are discarded from play.

card.name: Krusty's Clown College
card.text: When this Scene is played. move all Oddball Characters on other Scenes to this one.

card.name: Phineas Q. Butterfat's 5600 Flavors Ice Cream Parlor
card.text: While this Scene is in play, each other Scene needs 1 less character to complete it.

card.name: Trading Up
card.text: Use when a Kid Character is played. Choose a Scene. Move all Kid Characters to that Scene.

card.name: Sneak Attack
card.text: Use when another player tries to complete a Scene. That player doesn't get any points from that Scene.

card.name: Helping Hands
card.text: Use during your turn. Look through your deck for up to 3 Characters and put them in your hand. Shuffle your deck.

card.name: Trading Places
card.text: Use during your turn. Choose 2 Scenes. Switch all Characters on those 2 Scenes.

card.name: He Ain't Heavy
card.text: Use during your turn. You can play any number of Characters this turn.

card.name: Same as It Ever Was
card.text: Use during your turn. Return a Character in your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Springfield Elementary
card.text: If this Scene is completed using Lisa, the player who played this Scene gets 1 extra point.

card.name: You're Fired
card.text: Use when a Character card is played. That Character is discarded from play.

card.name: Exposed
card.text: Use when a Character is played to a Scene it doesn't match. All Characters that don't match the Scenes they're on are discarded from play.

card.name: Springfield Retirement Castle
card.text: On each player's turn, playing Old Characters doesn't count against the 2 Character per turn limit.

card.name: Poison Pill
card.text: Use when a Character is played on a Scene. That Scene and all Characters on it are discarded from play.

card.name: Melt Down
card.text: Use during your turn. All Scenes and Characters are discarded from play.

card.name: Wipe Out
card.text: Use during your turn. Choose a trait. All Characters with that trait are discarded from play.

card.name: Christmas
card.text: Rascal Characters don't match this Scene. All other Characters match it.

card.name: Knocked down a Peg
card.text: Use any time. Each player with more points than you loses a point.

card.name: Off Limits
card.text: Use at the start of another player's turn. Choose a Scene. Characters can't be played on that Scene this turn.

card.name: Krusty Burger
card.text: If this Scene is completed or trashed, the player who played it draws 3 cards.

card.name: Losers Pay
card.text: Use at the start of another player's turn. Choose a trait. Characters with that trait can't be played this turn.

card.name: Krustylu Studios
card.text: If this Scene is completed using Krusty, the player who played this Scene gets 1 extra point.

card.name: Slimy Tactics
card.text: Use when another player tries to complete a Scene. That Scene can't be completed this turn (and the Characters on it stay there).

card.name: Burns Manor
card.text: If this Scene is completed using Mr. Burns, the player who played this Scene gets 1 extra point.

card.name: Springfield Church
card.text: Other scenes can't be trashed.
